sentences.en: A nap is a tempting idea.
sentences.cn: 睡一会午觉这主意很不错.

sentences.en: An elderly person may nap during the day and then sleep only five hours a night.
sentences.cn: 老年人白天会小睡一会儿，然后晚上只睡5个小时。
偶尔打个盹是有好处的.

sentences.en: Don't bother me while I am taking my nap.
sentences.cn: 我小睡的时候不要打扰我.

sentences.en: He takes a nap after dinner.
I might take a little nap.
I took a nap after lunch on a hot day.
sentences.cn: 热天午饭后我小睡片刻.

sentences.en: It would be better to read after nap when you are sleepy in reading.
sentences.cn: 困时看书不如睡醒后再看.

sentences.en: It's a nap . Tomorrow morning at ten o'clock.
sentences.cn: 简单得很. 明早十点.

sentences.en: She aroused the children from their nap.
sentences.cn: 她把午睡的孩子们唤醒.

sentences.en: She took a nap every afternoon.
sentences.cn: 她每天下午小睡一会儿.

sentences.en: She tucked the baby in his crib for a nap.
sentences.cn: 她把婴儿裹好放在童床里小睡一会儿.

sentences.en: the goalkeeper was caught napping by a shot from Carpenter.
sentences.cn: 卡彭特的射门让守门员措手不及。

sentences.en: The jungle spread beneath him in a green velvet nap.
sentences.cn: 丛林铺展在他的脚下,象一片绿丝绒那么毛茸茸的.

sentences.en: The nap of the coat has been worn off.
sentences.cn: 外衣上的绒毛已经磨掉了.

sentences.en: Why don't you take a nap?

words.tran_cn: （指呢绒）没有绒毛的；（衣服等）磨破了的
打盹；预测…可能获胜（nap的过去分词）
小睡；疏忽；使起绒（nap的ing形式）
小睡，打盹儿；细毛；孤注一掷

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（动作，事件）发生在某人无备之时，发生在某人疏忽大意时
（纳普牌戏）冒险自报满贯，要全拿五墩

trans.tran_cn: 小睡，打盹，一种牌戏，绒毛，孤注一掷
trans.tran_en: a short sleep, especially during the day
